patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,9 +1,9 @@
 const mysql = require('mysql2');
 
 const pool = mysql.createPool({
-host: 'localhost/',
-user: 'boat',
+host: 'localhost',
+user: 'root',
 database: 'survey_com',
 password: '784512'
 });

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,10 +2,10 @@
 
 const pool = mysql.createPool({
 host: 'localhost',
 user: 'root',
-database: 'survey_com',
-password: '784512'
+database: '',
+password: ''
 });
 
 
 module.exports = pool.promise();
\ No newline at end of file

Index:

--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,9 +2,9 @@
 
 const pool = mysql.createPool({
 host: 'localhost',
 user: 'root',
-database: '',
+database: 'it_com',
 password: ''
 });

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -4,11 +4,11 @@
 const pool = mysql.createPool({
   host: process.env.DB_HOST || 'localhost',
   user: process.env.DB_USER || 'root',
   password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD || '',
-  database: process.env.DB_NAME || 'your_db_name',
+  database: process.env.DB_NAME || 'ร',
   waitForConnections: true,
   connectionLimit: 10,
   queueLimit: 0,
 });
 
\ No newline at end of file
-module.exports = pool;
+module.exports = pool;
